meanings: (소원·목적 등을) achieve, accomplish, fulfill, (formal) attain, (formal) realize

meanings.meaning: There are no rules here--we're trying to accomplish something.

examples.korean: There are no rules here--we're trying to accomplish something. (Thomas A. Edison) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여기(인생, 세상)에 규칙이란 없다. 우리는 무언가 이루려 노력하고 있을 뿐이다. (토마스 A. 에디슨, 일명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: There are no rules here--we're trying to accomplish something. (Thomas A. Edison) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort. (Calvin Coolidge) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 중요한 일을 이루려 노력할 때 사람들의 말에 너무 신경쓰지 않는 것이 바람직하다는 사실을 깨달았다. 예외 없이 이들은 안된다고 공언한다. 하지만 바로 이 때가 노력할 절호의 시기이다. (캘빈 쿨리지, 노력명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort. (Calvin Coolidge) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Anyone who has ever dreamed about something and tried their best to pursue it most likely will realize their dreams. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무언가에 대해 꿈을 꾸면서 그 꿈을 이루려 노력하기만 하다면 그 꿈은 실현될 가능성이 아주 높습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Anyone who has ever dreamed about something and tried their best to pursue it most likely will realize their dreams. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I tried a pretty radical change. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 매우 급진적인 변화를 이루려했다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 쿠쿵(ssie****)
examples.english: I tried a pretty radical change. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Harry Redknapp is closing in on his dream job of managing England after all. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 결국 해리 레드냅이 잉글랜드 팀 감독직의 꿈을 이루려 한다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 einky(eink****)
examples.english: Harry Redknapp is closing in on his dream job of managing England after all. Add to Wordbook
